chapters.title: Prologue: Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info: Duhara Basaheen, p. 51—Sitter for the Red Ajah in Tar Valon. Apparently Elaida had to show her who was boss at some point. She has large, dark eyes and coppery skin, and is tall and slim. She grew up in Arad Doman. She served as Keeper of the Chronicles under Sierin Vayu. Duhara has gone missing from the Tower in recent weeks; her whereabouts and health are unknown.
